data.title: Non-profit organization for the protection of copyright and related rights (Amanat) - CRSEA
data.text:
Activity

Non-profit organization for the protection of copyright and related rights “Amanat ”

Purpose of creation

Execution of the rights of performers and producers of phonograms to receive remuneration for public performance, broadcasting by air and cable of phonograms published for commercial purposes, in accordance with the norms of the national legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

Basic principles of work

Openness and accountability to rights holders;

Efficiency and aimed functionality;

Agility and affirmative approach.

Payment of remuneration to performers and producers of phonograms through AMANAT is a prerequisite for a legitimate use of phonograms published for commercial purposes, when they are publicly performed, broadcasted by air or cable.
